transit_routes.name: Flåm Railway to Myrdal
transit_routes.note: One of world's steepest railways. 20km, 866m elevation change.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Stegastein
transit_routes.note: Dramatic viewing platform 650m above fjord. Hairpin road up.

featured_experiences.name: Flåm Railway Journey
featured_experiences.note: Book early - sells out on ship days. One of world's most scenic railways.

featured_experiences.name: Stegastein Viewpoint
featured_experiences.note: Glass-floored platform extends 30m over fjord. Vertigo-inducing.

featured_experiences.name: Village & Ægir Brewpub
featured_experiences.note: World's only bar in Viking-style longhouse. Award-winning beers.
